title: Relationship Schema
description: A relationship between two entities. Doc: https://manifest.build/docs/entities#relations

entity.description: The class name of the entity that the relationship is with.

eager.description:
Whether the relationship should be eager loaded. Otherwise, you need to explicitly request the relation in the client SDK or API.
Defaults to false.

helpText.description: Optional help text to provide additional guidance for the relationship in the admin UI.

anyOf.description: A simple string representing the class name of the entity
